item.title: Release v1.0.4 — A new milestone for Plakar
item.description: Plakar v1.0.4 introduces pre-packaged binaries, a new plugin system for integrations, smarter caching, policy-based lifecycle management, UI refinements, and major performance boosts — marking a milestone release for the platform.

item.title: It doesn't make sense to wrap modern data in a 1979 format, introducing .ptar
item.description: .ptar is our own archive format, a self-contained kloset, a container for your data. You end up with a standalone file that provides deduplication, compression, encryption, with all of the fancy features of a kloset store !

item.title: Plakar v1.0.2 was released: mostly S3 improvements !
item.description: Plakar v1.0.2 adds an automatic security check for new critical releases. It also fixes relative-path resolution when using an agent, plus delivers dramatic S3 performance and memory improvements for faster, more reliable backups.

item.title: Introducing Plakar v1.0 to redefine Open-Source Data Protection with $3M funding
item.description: Immutable, queryable, encrypted snapshots with context and integrity — Kloset redefines how data is stored, verified, and reused…

item.title: Plakar 1.0.1-beta.13 out !
item.description: New UI filters, timeline navigation, S3 and FTP support, checkpointing, and performance boosts in Plakar’s latest beta release…
